config.script:
if self.view.params.isMachine:
		# Navigate to Carrousel View
		machinePage = "/maquina/" + self.view.params.eqPathCoded
		system.perspective.navigate(machinePage)
		
	
	else: # Drill Down
		children = self.view.params.children
		
		if children == 'areas':
			nextView = 'Navigation/Area Selection'
			params = {	'plant': self.view.params.itemCode
						# Also load areas and their parameters
			}
		elif children == 'machines':
			nextView = 'Navigation/Machine Selection'
			params = {	'plant': self.view.params.parent,
						'area': self.view.params.itemCode
						# Also load areas and their parameters
			}
		
		system.perspective.navigate(view=nextView, params=params)
